name: Memories (itch) (Landon)
description:
This game is inspired by my grandfather who died of Alzheimer's before I could meet him. I decided to take a little liberty on the Heart Jam's theme of scarcity and instead of making a tangible resource scarce, I decided to explore the fact that as you get older, or as a mentally debilitating disease takes hold, your relationships and memories because more and more scarce.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it!
